EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECIEVED FROM VESSEL, 150 PERSONS ON BOARD,
IN 34-25N 012-13E AT 241045Z APR. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
